CustomField.description: API Name of the Lookup Field on the Master Object. If left blank, extra fields will be applied to all lookups of lookup type on master object (e.g. Related_Change__c )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: API name of the field on the lookup object. If left blank, extra fields will be applied to all lookups of lookup type on master object (e.g. Related_Change__c )
CustomField.label: Controlling Field
